task: Retrieve the red apple from the kitchen counter and place it on the wooden cutting board on the dining table.
Locate the flashlight and report its position.
Pick up the ceramic plate with some bread crumbs and place it on the kitchen counter.
Navigate to the position of the safety helmet.
Move forward by 2.5 meters.
Retrieve the fire extinguisher and place it on the ladder.
Locate the smartphone and tell me its X, Y, and Z coordinates.
Pick up the pair of gloves and place them on the tarp.
Navigate to the pair of boots and wait for 5 seconds.
Follow a predefined path to navigate to the fireproof blanket and the walkie-talkie.
Retrieve the water bottle and place it on the map.
Turn 90 degrees to your left.
Pick up the roll of duct tape and place it on the crowbar.
Locate the hammer and move it to the safety helmet's location.
Move backward by 1.5 meters.
Request assistance with the message: 'Help needed to identify the camping stove.'
Retrieve the backpack and place it on the folding chair.
Locate the tarp and navigate to its position.
Turn 180 degrees and move forward 3 meters.
Follow a path that leads to the notebook and pen, the pair of binoculars, and the bag of sand.
Retrieve the empty glass cup from next to the sink and place it near the red apple on the kitchen counter.
Check the current battery level.
Locate the ceramic plate with bread crumbs and align it upright on the wooden cutting board.
Pick up the silver knife from the counter and place it next to the red apple.
Find the medical splint and report its position.
Retrieve the ladder and place it near the stack of wood.
Locate the compass and report its X, Y, and Z coordinates.
Pick up the tarp and place it over the stack of wood.
Navigate to the position of the folding chair.
Move forward by 1.0 meter.
Retrieve the thermal blanket and place it on the sleeping bag.
Locate the fireproof blanket and align it flat on the ground.
Pick up the walkie-talkie and place it on the backpack.
Navigate to the safety helmet and wait for 3 seconds.
Follow a predefined path to navigate to the rope and the crowbar.
Retrieve the bag of rice and place it on the cooking pot.
Turn 45 degrees to the right.
Pick up the first aid kit and place it on the wooden cutting board.
Locate the emergency flare and report its position.
Move backward by 0.5 meters.
Request assistance with the message: 'Help needed to locate the car jack.'
Retrieve the notebook and pen and place them on the table near the flashlight.
Locate the crowbar and align it parallel to the ladder.
Turn 270 degrees and move forward 1.5 meters.
Follow a path that leads to the hammer, the roll of duct tape, and the folding knife.
Retrieve the can of soup and place it on the camping stove.
Check the current battery level of the robot.
Locate the water filter and place it next to the safety helmet.
Pick up the stack of wood and align it upright.
Find the fire extinguisher and place it near the emergency flare.
